bouncer.desc: Sends the MotD in the chat.
Locks the wait list.
Toggles the DJ Cycle.
Moves a user on the wait list.
Keeps the current DJ on the wait list after their turn.
Blocks users under the specified level from posting.
Toggles spam protection.
Adds a word to the spam protection list.
Toggles Darude spam protection.
Swaps two users on the wait list.
Lockskips the current song.
Unlocks the wait list.
Skips the current song.
Removes the user from the wait list.
Kicks the user out of the room.
Executes the user.
Mutes the user.
Unmutes the user.
Blocks the user from posting links.
Lets the user post links again.
Deletes the user's chat.
Deletes all gifs in the chat.
Deletes all images in the chat.
Deletes all links in the chat.
Deletes all messages containing the text.
Deletes all emotes in the chat.
Checks the user's votes over the past 30 songs.
Displays who meh'd the song in the browser's console.
Checks if the user is autochatting.
Checks when the user joined the room.
Displays a few settings and uptime.
Checks if the current song is overplayed.
Checks how many people chatted in the past minutes.
Pong!
Displays the add queue.
Gets one of the 4 saved wait lists.
Starts a game of Hangman.
Displays Tastybot's XP.
Displays who is at that level.
Sets the level required to post links in the chat.
Clears Tastybot's add queue.
Clears the Join Queue.
Sets your Slack name so messages are sent there instead.
Toggles Autoskip.
Labels the current song or a provided link.
Checks the current song's label.
Looks for labels that contain the specified term.

manager.desc: Reloads Tastybot.
This kills the bot.
You don't want to know.
This one either.
Deletes everything in the chat.
Permanently bans the user.
Adds the linked song to the Blacklist.
Removes the linked song from the Blacklist.
Checks the next song in the Blacklist buffer.
Adds and moves Tastybot to the front of the wait list.
Adds the user to the Manager list.
Adds the user to the Bouncer list.
Adds the user to the RDJ list.
Removes the user from the Manager list.
Removes the user from the Bouncer list.
Removes the user from the RDJ list.
Displays who is on the Staff list.
Test command.
Rigs the Lottery so that the user of the command wins next time.
Makes Tastybot woot the current song.
Sends a message on Slack via Slackbot.
Starts a Raffle that'll pick a winner after some minutes.
Toggles Lockguard.
Toggles Cycleguard.
Toggles Timeguard.
Changes Duel settings.
Changes Giveaway settings.
Toggles Join Mode.
Toggles Lottery Day.
Changes Lottery settings.
Changes AntiAFK settings.
Used for changing various command settings.
Toggles Event Mode, which is used for events.
Rolls a random number between 1 and number. Defaults to 6.

rdj.desc: Explains how to check if a song is overplayed.
Explains what a Brand Ambassador is.
Explains what an Admin is.
Explains how we promote users to Resident DJ.
Explains how to get the cat avatar and why staff have it.
Explains why we have a custom background.
Explains how the Lottery works.
Explains how Duels work.
Explains how to check the song history.
Explains how to join the wait list.
Explains how we choose users to become staff.
Explains how to create a community.
Explains how Plug Points and XP are earned.
Explains why the wait list is locked.
Explains that we don't do user-to-user swaps on the wait list.
Explains how to send links in the chat.
Explains how Wait List Buddies work.
Tell users to stop complaining and meh/mute the song.
Sends Tastycat's social links.
Explains how a user can get their spot back after disconnecting.
Displays our definition of NSFW content.
Explains how a user can see how long until they DJ.
Explains how gaining XP works.
Explains how to get a name change.
Explains what gifts are and how to send them.

user.desc: Use when a round of Hangman has begun to guess a letter or word.
Explains our community's theme.
Sends a link to our rules.
Sends a link to our FAQ.
Sends links to the emoji list and TastyPlug emotes list.
Sends a link to this page!
Sends a link to our Facebook page.
Sends a link to TastyPlug's page.
Shows you approximately how much time until you DJ.
Sends a link to plug.dj support.
Sends a link to the plug.dj tech blog.
Sends a link to the plug.dj blog.
Sends a link to the Tastycat blog.
Displays the current song's name.
Returns you to your spot if you lost it.
Sets an AFK message to display when you're away.
Lets staff members promote themselves back to Bouncer.
Lets staff members demote themselves if they are busy.
Displays the users currently in the Join Queue.
Sends a cookie to a user!
Sends flowers to a user!
Sends food to a user!
Throws shoes at a user!
Sends your love to a user!
Sends pizza to a user!
Punches a user!
Sends a fortune cookie to a user!
Displays a random cat gif. Because cats.
Generates an acronym of the specified length, without the excluded letters.
Sends a Duel request to a user. It's time to d-d-d-d-duel!
Checks a user's Duel stats.
Displays the top [number] Duel users sorted by argument given.
Makes you opt in or out of Duels so others can't challenge you.
Requests a user to be your Wait List Buddy, or find/divorce your current one.
Displays the top [number] Wait List Buddy pairs.
Starts a Giveaway where your spot is randomly given out.
Accepts something, like the Lottery!
Declines something, like a Duel!
Opts you in or out of the Lottery.
Joins the Join Queue so Tastybot can add you to the wait list.
Leaves the Join Queue.
Use this command to enter a Raffle when one is started!
